title: VegVida
description:
A vegan rotisserie kind of store carrying vegan food with some fresh items and frozen ones (appetizers, main meals, desserts). Produces vegan versions of many traditional meals, international ones (like burgers, moussaka or Chinese vegetables) or Brazilian ones (like feijoada, moqueca or pao-de-queijo). Sells seasonal and festive foods also (chocolate for Easter, special meals for Christmas, and so on). 
Everything sold is 'to go.' Offers motorcycle delivery service on Fridays for limited regions (special fee applies). Does catering. No credit cards; debit or cash only.
